mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_time, notice_user) values (#{noticeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noticeTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_time, notice_user from notice
select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_time, notice_user from notice where notice_time>now() order by notice_time;
select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_time, notice_user from notice where notice_time>now() and notice_user = #{noticeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by notice_time;
